mapper.sql: ID, KZID, PAYSTYLE, AMOUNT, STAFFID, STAFFNAME, FROM_UNIXTIME(PAYMENTTIME, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') PAYMENTTIME, STATUS
mapper.select: SELECT log.ID, log.KZID, log.PAYSTYLE, log.AMOUNT, log.STAFFID, log.STAFFNAME, log.PAYMENTTIME, dic.DICNAME AS PAYSTYLENAME FROM ${table} log LEFT JOIN hm_crm_dictionary dic ON log.PAYSTYLE = dic.DICCODE AND log.COMPANYID = dic.COMPANYID AND dic.DICTYPE = 'pay_style' WHERE log.ID = #{id} AND log.COMPANYID = #{companyId};
